A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The critic reviews on this movie are extremely suspect. This movie\, in my opinion\, was the worst Star Wars movie in the franchises history and an insult to every original Star Wars fan out there. They killed the heart and soul of what made Star Wars iconic. If it weren't for Rogue One\, this movie would have ruined every ounce of hope I had for the series going forward.
